Text:
need to implement showing notifications like on picture. To show 1 notification with counter when their count more than 1. Didn't find info in official doc. Now I just update my notification by id:

    ((NotificationManager) context.getSystemService(Context.NOTIFICATION_SERVICE))
                    .notify(PUSH_NOTIFICATION_ID, notification);



[![notification example][1]][1]


  [1]: https://i.stack.imgur.com/atuoJ.png

Will be glad any proposals and sorry for my English.

I want to show notifications like on picture. If there is more than one, I want to show a counter too. I didn't find info in official doc. Now I just update my notification by id:

    ((NotificationManager) context.getSystemService(Context.NOTIFICATION_SERVICE))
                    .notify(PUSH_NOTIFICATION_ID, notification);



[![notification example][1]][1]


  [1]: https://i.stack.imgur.com/atuoJ.png

How can I do it ?
